INVOKE.COMMENT: gets customer available amount from db for the given ID
adds given amount with existing available amount
updates the final amount in the db

BRANCH.COMMENT: to check if available amount is less than transaction amount

SEQUENCE.NAME: %debitEmployeeDetails/results[0]/AVAILABLEAMOUNT%<%customerDetails/amount%
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: avilable amount is less than trans amount

Values.value: invalid transaction:Available amount is less than transaction amount

SEQUENCE.NAME: $default
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: transaction amount may be equal or less than available amount

INVOKE.COMMENT: subtracts transaction amount from available amount
updates the final amount in the db

MAP.NAME: $default
MAP.COMMENT: transaction type is neither credit nor debit
